msbt.message: So get this. Some clumsy litterbug dropped their DIY recipe out in front of my house.It's for a Bunny Day crown. Want it? I cleaned the dirt off as best I could, so it oughta be legible.
No need to thank me. I'm just doin' my part to keep tidy, .Plus I'd hate to see a fine DIY recipe like that go to waste.
Whassat? Well now, it looks like your pockets are a bit short on space.Tell you what. You go make room in your pockets, and I'll hang on to the recipe till you get back.
Do you have any need for a Bunny Day bag DIY recipe?I stumbled across it a bit ago. Fell down and everythin'! Anyhoo, it's all yours.
There's just something magical about whippin' up your very own DIY whatsit, .
Oh, come on now! Your pockets are all full up.You go clear some room and I'll fret over my knee,
This Bunny Day's been weird. Seems like everywhere I look, I keep findin' more .Think you'd wanna take a few off me? Actually, I ain't askin'. Here's 5 .
You're clever, so I'm certain you'll come up with some kind of use for 'em, . Take care, kiddo!
Oh Full pockets, huh? I reckon that figures. Could go make some room and then come back. I'll wait.
